name: Candy Cane Adventure 2
description:
Candy Cane is quickly making enemies in the local gang! After defeating the brute Gumdrop, Candy Cane received a letter from the egotistical Black Licorice. Black Licorice has kidnapped everyone in Sweetsville, and is holding them captive! Only Candy Cane can battle his way through 5 worlds to bring Black Licorice down!

Dash, jump, and shoot your way through 5 worlds, each with their own set of traps and dangers!

Enjoy, and remember, DEATH IS SWEET!

http://www.topbunkstudios.blogspot.com/ <- Go here for more games!
